location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to Robert Garden from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter states that during Beaumont and Green's captivity, Carim Cahn [Karim Khan] had indicated to them that he was inclined to exchange raw silk for woolens. Letter also discusses the agreement made with Carim Cahn that he shall purchase three or four lachs of rupees worth of cloth and perpets per annum.
